overview:
Ramesh Nair is one of the founders of Niyati Technologies, an India based branding and website development company.

Ramesh started his professional career in 1995 as a copywriter in advertising. He moved over to the internet and multimedia field in 1998 and started Niyati in 1999. Based in Chennai, India, Niyati provides creative communication solutions for clients across the world.

Niyati is well known in the industry for it’s highly creative solutions in branding, website design and development, multimedia, print design, online marketing and software development.

Currently Ramesh handles Creative Direction and Business Development at Niyati.

View Niyati’s work portfolio at www.niyati.biz
